general.gigTitle: convert website to app, android app and ios app, pro mobile app development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Mobile developer with the Highest Number of positive ratings on Fiverr
sellerCard.description:
A full-time Android and iOS software engineer who has been making a living on Fiverr since 2012. I create apps for websites, companies, schools, etc. I don't stop working until you are 100% satisfied! Good things come with hard work, so I will always strive to be the best version of myself and my work. 

It has been an exciting journey! I have been lucky enough to do what I love since 2012, and I am looking forward to continuing to do so.

description.content:
*Converting websites into apps professionally since 2012*


Please contact me before ordering to receive 100% GUARANTEED Apple and Google approval.


My name is Nace. I have been converting websites into apps on Fiverr over 10 years. I don't stop working until you are fully satisfied, and I provide professional support before, during and after the work is done. I do this for living, so I take my work very seriously. Each and every buyer will receive my personal care and attention.


The process:


- Please contact me and send me the URL

- I will inform you what to expect and prepare

- Leave everything else to me!


What I offer:


- New website content updated automatically

- Lifetime customer support

- Professionally developed apps to sync with your website flow, colors, logo, font, style

- UNIQUE: Choose your layout and easily edit apps anytime!

- Works on phones and tablets

- Unlimited push notifications

- Unlimited links & buttons

- Analytics

- Social media

- Contact page with action buttons

- About/Services

- APK/IPA files

- Etc.


I work with all websites: Wordpress, Shopify, Wix, GoDaddy, Squarespace, Weebly, HostGator, etc. I am looking forward to working with you!

questionsAndAnswers.question: If the app displays the latest website content, why do I need a control panel?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In a traditional app you have no control over the native content that is NOT webview: main menu and various native pages, images, colors, etc. In a traditional way for such changes apps need to be reconstructed, and new versions sent to Apple and Google. This gig changes that, for your convenience.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is the control panel easy to use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! It is meant for people with no coding knowledge. It is easy to edit the app pages, colors, backgrounds, text, follow your app analytics like number of downloads, most visited app features, etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What are push notifications and how do they work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In the control panel: You write a message, press send and all app users will get a notification on their device and receive the message. People's phones will vibrate and make a notification sound. It can be a special offer, an announcement, information, you name it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are there any monthly fees or similar?
After the job is done, if I need help, or a modification  can I contact you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! A part of my job is to be there for my clients even after the job is done, regardless if it was one day or one year ago. And I've been here since 2012.

questionsAndAnswers.question: My website is not in English. Is that a problem?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No problem whatsoever. I can make apps in any language.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate my AdMob ads?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! For free! You will just need to send me your AdMob Ad Unit ID and tell me if it is for a banner or an interstitial ad. Just make sure you don't have AdSense on the website because Google does not allow you to have both.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you work on custom projects? Do you make custom apps or work on other people's apps?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I only convert websites into apps, and I only work on apps created by me.

packageList.title: One OS. Android or iOS.
packageList.description: Only Android or only iOS. Not both. Pro screenshots + control panel included.

reviews.comment: He goes over and beyond to make sure your job is done right!! He did an amazing job, I highly recommend anyone who is trying to get an app built to use him. You will not be disappointed. 5 Star service all the way!!! Thank you so much.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your order! As always, I will be here if you need me about any questions.

reviews.comment: "You’ll also experience a masterclass in managing business through well-defined processes that deliver the results you desire—look no further. Outstanding work! From the very first moment, I knew I had found my go-to developer for life. Great Guy, did a tremendous job! just as someone we all know would say!"

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your order! As always, please feel free to reach out to me if you need me about anything.

reviews.comment: It was great working with Nace, I had issues building an APP myself so by the time I came to Nace I was about to give up. I had issues with a few bits along the way and he was very patient and kept walking me through everything. He was very professional, got back to me quickly, delivered everything he promised and put me at ease. Couldn’t recommend working with Nace enough!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your order and generous tip, Olivia! As always, I will be here if you need me!

reviews.comment: Nace was very patient, explained the process as this was my first time, but in the end, it was all a success, I would recommend anyone to use him without thinking twice, he is very honest with his work.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your order! As always, please feel free to get in touch if you need me.

reviews.comment: Nace did an AMAZING job on my mobile app—expert-level coding, completely bug-free, and even exceeded my expectations! Working with him was a breeze thanks to his fluency and deep understanding, and he truly went the extra mile. Highly recommend! 🙌

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your new order! I will be here if you need me with any questions.

reviews_snippet.comment: Nace has a very good  understanding of how Apps work. He is always willing and ready to offer advice as well.

An incredible experience start to finish working with Nace.  A highly recommend this freelancer for any of your building needs.  Extremely impressed with his professionalism and rapid execution of my idea.

I want to thank Nace for the amazing work on my app. From day one, they have been professional, responsive, and attentive to every detail. They turned my idea into reality with great skill and dedication. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a talented developer!

The work was done flowlessly, exceeding our expectations. We thought our request was impossible, but he accomplished everything we asked for and even more. I wouldn't hesitate to work with him again on our next project.
Nace is the MVP in this game. He was superbly knowledgeable and cooperative. I love to work with him. I will hire him soon for my very next project.

activeEducations.school: Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Information Technologies - FEIT, Ss Cyril and Methodius University, Skopje

consultationData.description: We will discuss your 'convert website to app' project (related to my gigs) in detail and make a plan for the best implementation. I will answer your questions and give expert advice.
